subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: As the first Nextel Cup champion, Jimmie Johnson has joined a prestigious inner circle. He is now one the sport’s most visible drivers, along with Jeff Gordon, Tony Stewart and Dale Earnhardt Jr.
snippet: As the first Nextel Cup champion, Jimmie Johnson has joined a prestigious inner circle. He is now one the sport’s most visible drivers, along with Jeff Gordon, Tony Stewart and Dale Earnhardt Jr.
